scenario_1.persona_desc: A scientist or researcher who specializes in the study of arthropods, specifically the Podisus maculiventris spined soldier bug. They are interested in the optimal temperature and thermal requirement for the pest, as well as the development and survival of the bug at different temperatures. They are looking for comprehensive data and explanations on the optimal temperature and thermal requirement for the pest, which can be used to optimize environmental condition in mass rearing and predicting phenology of the bug in the field.
scenario_1.thought: As a scientist, my personal preferences are less relevant than the pursuit of objective data. However, since this is a social preferences experiment, some element of personal preference must come into play. Both options provide me with the same amount of money (400). Option Right gives the other person more money (750 vs 400). I don't have any strong reason to deprive the other person of extra money. Therefore, I will choose the option that maximizes the other person's earnings without diminishing my own. This approach reflects a degree of altruism, which isn't incompatible with my profession's commitment to the betterment of understanding.
